name: Apropos
description: Display a list of commands whose names match {topics}

name: Apropos in-depth
description: Display all commands and variables whose documentation matches {topic}

name: describe-function
description: Display documentation on Lisp function {function}

name: Display Bindings
description: Displays a list of all currently active keybindings in the order minor, major, then global.

name: Yank Line
description: Yank whole line without selecting

name: comment line
description: Comments line, without selection

name: indent-region
description: Auto-indents selection

name: show all sessions
description: Shows all active sessions. Useful for checking if there are detatched sessions hanging around.

name: split pane vertically
description: Splits the pane, vertically.

name: undo
description: step back in undo buffer

name: Execute sh
description: executes shell-command using bash

name: save macro
description: saves {macro} as a series of keystrokes to {register}

name: show registers
description: Shows a list of the evil-mode-registers

name: replay macro
description: replays the macro saved to {register}

name: reverse undo
description: redoes the last undo
note: may have to C-g again to get normal undoing behavior

name: search-under-cursor
description: Search forward for whatever is under the cursor.  As with regular search, ? goes backward and n goes forward through instances of the word.

name: find all refs
description: Find all references for an identifier at point

name: find file at point
description: finds file under cursor, when in move mode

name: pop-marker-stack
description: jump back to the last place you C-c . -ed. Can jump backwards as many times as you've called xref-find-definitions

name: evil goto-definition
description: find xrefs of item at cursor

name: rust-run
description: Runs rust code in the editor

name: run code
description: run shell commands or lisp code, starting at the cursor

name: shell-command-on-region
description: runs region as shell command.  Must define region in minibuffer

name: evil-indent-region
description: indent region in evil visual mode

name: goto next {char}
description: find next instance of {char}  F {char} to find previous.

name: Linux Mint Version
description: check hostnamectl for more info.  Linux Mint Uma : Ubuntu Focal

name: create frame
description: open current buffer in a new frame

name: kill frame
description: kill current frame

name: makrdown-do
description: create or check a checkbox
